= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *BA* || *Comments* ||
|| *PCA.FT.SPL.SA* || Somatosensory Association Cortex || Locating objects in space || 5 || Superior parietal lobule ||
|| *PCA.FT.SPL.PR* || Precuneus || Spatial orientation, Representation of the self || 7 || Superior parietal lobule ||
|| *PCA.FT.IPL* || Inferior Parietal Lobule || Perception of emotions in facial stimuli and interpretation of sensory information || 40 || SMG, Represent spoken words, tool use ||
|| *PCA.FT.IPS* || Intraparietal Sulcus || Perceptual-motor coordination and visual attention, eye movements and reaching || 39 || AG, Represent written words ||
|| *PCA.FT.RSC* || Retrosplenial Cortex || Processing of emotionally salient stimuli || 26,29,30 || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.FT.PCG* || Posterior Cingulate Cortex || Self-awareness, pain and episodic memory retrieval || 23,31 || Medial parietal lobe ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.RIL* || Rostral Intralaminar Nucleus of Thalamus || Stimulate memory-guided response || - || from brainstem to SPL.SA ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.LP* || Lateral Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus || Visual association cortex || - || from superior colliculus, pretectum ||
|| *PCA.FD.TH.SG* || Suprageniculate Nucleus of Thalamus || Spacial coding of auditory information || - || From tectum, somatic sensations ||

= Groupings and Subdivisions  =

  * PCA.IPS is divided into MIP, LIP, VIP, AIP
